ygData.subject: Stupid Moron Spellcasters (Rated R)
ygData.msgSnippet: Okay, listen up. This is a MAJOR RANT that contains course language directed towards spell casters, so if you re a spell caster and you get your feelings hurt
ygData.messageBody:
Okay, listen up. This is a MAJOR RANT that
contains course language directed towards spell casters,
so if you're a spell caster and you get your
feelings hurt easily, don't keep reading.<br><br>Listen up
you stupid sons of bitches who call yourselves "Spell
Casters" or "Magic Users", END YOUR LIVES.<br><br>I was
hunting in Unrest tonight in a group on Xev that was made
up of 4 spell casters and 2 tanks. I was one of
those tanks. Now, I know you spell casters have to sit
on your asses and look at your fucking books often
so you can regenerate your mana to cast your crap
spells that do little to nothing, but when your tank is
getting his ass beaten by a werebat STAND UP YOU STUPID
MORON. <br><br>We're in the "Round Room" camping and the
other tank (being an idiot who was born to be a
spellcaster) pulls a ghoul (approx lvl 10) and a werebat
(approx lvl 20). So, what do the spell casters and the
moron tank do? They attack the ghoul and leave me with
the werebat! So I swear at them and the tank comes
and helps me out. We're both getting hit for about
50-70 hp a shot by this thing, so what do the spell
casters do? Shout "OOM!" and sit down. The werebat hits
the other tank for like 100 points and he dies.
Leaving me with 25% health. The healer starts to heal the
wizard (80% health) who was hurt during the attack with
the ghoul. I, trying to give the stupid spellcasters
a hint run behind them to try to get the werebat to
hit them. But he doesn't and knocks me unconcious
right next to them. They're all standing now, but don't
move in to take the hit so I can live, no they let the
werebat kill me. So I go back to Kaladim, and then I see
the group message "Wow that werebat gave good
experience." <br><br>I went absolutely fucking
nuts.<br><br>LISTEN UP MORONS: I UNDERSTAND YOU DON'T HAVE AS MUCH
HIT POINTS AS US, BUT IF YOUR TANK IS UNCONCIOUS ON
THE FLOOR, STEP FORWARD AND TAKE A DAMN HIT. I KNOW
YOUR BUSY STARING AT YOUR STUPID BOOK, BUT GET OFF
YOUR ASSES AND DO SOME DAMN WORK. ONE HIT ISN'T GOING
TO KILL YOU, AND IT WOULD GIVE TIME FOR THE STUPID
HEALER TO GET A FUCKING CLUE AND HEAL ME. I KNOW IT
TAKES LIKE AN IQ OF 10 TO FIGURE THAT OUT AND MOST
SPELL CASTERS DONT HAVE THAT IQ, SO I'LL SPELL IT OUT
FOR YOU.<br><br>T A K E A F U C K I N G H I T!<br>YOU
STUPID MORON!<br><br>I'm done ranting now and feel a lot
better.
